dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 3667 IH: Veteran and Beginning Farmers Assistance Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Faso (for himself and Ms. Kuster of New Hampshire) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to provide for a 5-year extension of the appropriate technology transfer for rural areas program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Veteran and Beginning Farmers Assistance Act.

section.header: Extension of appropriate technology transfer for rural areas program
section.text: Section 310B(i)(4) of the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act (7 U.S.C. 1932(i)(4)) is amended by striking 2018 and inserting 2023.
